price: 31. Tolkanagow! Raaca daaciga Ilaahay12 oo aamina, Wuxuu (Alle) idiin dhaafi  den- biyadiinna, idinkana badbaadin cadaab xanuun badan.
arabic: يَٰقَوۡمَنَآ أَجِيبُواْ دَاعِيَ ٱللَّهِ وَءَامِنُواْ بِهِۦ يَغۡفِرۡ لَكُم مِّن ذُنُوبِكُمۡ وَيُجِرۡكُم مِّنۡ عَذَابٍ أَلِيمٖ
footnotes: 12. Ugu yeerahaa dadka xagga Alle waa Nabi Muxammad s.c.w.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: yāqawmanā ajībū dāʿiya al-lahi waāminū bihi yaghfir lakum min dhunūbikum wayujir'kum min ʿadhābin alīmin
